ADVANCED_TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scanner de longo alcance com cobertura para todo um sistema.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Protege a nave do calor da reentrada atmosférica.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY.description: Will withstand higher pressures than normal Atmospheric Shielding

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY_DESCRIPTION.message: A more capable version of Atmospheric Shields

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT.message: Suporte de Vida da Baía de Mercadoria

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Permite o transporte de mercadoria viva.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permite escavar contentores de mercadoria do espaço.

DAMAGE_PER_SHOT.description: Tooltip explaining weapon damage per shot

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: Um sistema de contra-medida eletrónica de defesa míssil, capaz de destruir os mais avançados tipos de mísseis teleguiados.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Um sistema de contra-medida eletrónica de defesa míssil, capaz de destruir mísseis teleguiados.

EMPTY_SLOT.description: Text indicating an empty equipment slot.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permite escavar combustível de hidrogénio a partir de planetas gigantes gasosos.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR.message: Sistema de reparação automática do casco

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Repara automaticamente o casco da nave em caso de dano.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Analiza as núvens de hiperespaço para determinar o destino e tempo de chegada ou partida.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Sistema de arrefecimento melhorado para as suas armas.

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Usado para explodir asteróides ricos em minerais.

MININGCANNON_5MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Usado para explodir asteróides ricos em minerais.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined into one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Embora menos efeciente que um escavador de combustível, permite escavar combustível e mercadoria

ORBIT_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude.

ORBIT_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A sensor used to scan planets from high altitude / orbit + model number (that's minimum km altitude)

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data, with high resolution and wide aperture lens

PULSECANNON_DUAL_1MW.message: Canhão de impulso de 1MW de duplo tiro

PULSECANNON_RAPID_2MW.message: Canhão de impulso de disparo rápido de 2MW

RADAR_DESCRIPTION.message: Fornece um mapa 3D das naves na vizinhança

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Aumentar a velocidade de recarga dos escudos

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Providencia defesas adicionais do casco por cada unidade instalada.

SHOTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Tooltip explaining weapon fire rate / RPM counter

STARTING_SCAN.message: A iniciar a pesquisa, a distância ao alvo é

SURFACE_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude. Model manufacturer name is meant to sound like a cheap brand.

SURFACE_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types. Model manufacturer name is meant to be associated with high quality.

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: High resolution cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Usado para inspecionar equipamento, mercadoria e estado de outras naves remotamente.

THRUSTERS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Um tipo modificado de propulsor aprovado para a sua nave.

THRUSTERS_BEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Propulsores feitos sob medida para prover a melhor entrega possível.

THRUSTERS_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION.message: Os propulsores foram otimizados para reduzir ineficiências e aumentar a entrega de força.

TOTAL_MODULE_CAPACITY.description: Tooltip explaining module capacity of specific slot

TOTAL_MODULE_WEIGHT.description: Tooltip explaining total equipped weight of specific slot

TRADE_COMPUTER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_COMPUTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Mostra os bens rentáveis para negociar entre o sistema sekecionado e o atual

UNOCCUPIED_CABIN_DESCRIPTION.message: Necessário para o transporte de um passageiro
